item.title: Adding Safe Zones?
item.dc:creator: @OleanPkz OleanPkz
item.description:
@OleanPkz wrote:

Okay I was told to search “nonwild” and this is what I found.

public boolean nonWildPvP() {
	if (absX >= 2730 && absX <= 2731 && absY >= 3497 && absY <= 3490) {
			return true;
		} else {
			return false;
	}
}

I want to add a new safe zone.

Coords:

if (absX >= 3082 && absX <= 3101 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3115) {

but when I add them together…

public boolean nonWildPvP() {
	if (absX >= 2730 && absX <= 2731 && absY >= 3497 && absY <= 3490) || if (absX >= 3082 && absX <= 3101 && absY >= 3099 && absY <= 3115) {{
			return true;
		} else {
			return false;
	}
}

It won’t work.

Help?

Read full topic
